text: Portland Church is an ancient church located in County Tipperary, Ireland. ==Location== Portland Church is located near Portumna, about from the River Shannon. ==Description== Portland Church is an early stone church with Romanesque features. The east window is very small and the sacristy at the rear is corbelled.http://www.pbase.com/image/110246484 ==References== Category:National Monuments in County Tipperary Category:Archaeological sites in County Tipperary
title: Portland Church
